titleStmt.title: Whereas by an act made in this present Parliament, intituled, An act for the enlargement of the periods of time limited in an act for the better execution of His Majesties gracious declaration, for the settlement of his kingdom of Ireland, &c. ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Ormonde.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1661-1669 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Crooke ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 5 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at the Council-chamber in Dublin, the 27th. day of May 1663."
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
